charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] heard a troubled and
flustered voice coming from the beach. It was
Akari with some Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1201_0200_10:
Oops, sorry you had to see me like that. I feel so
uncool now.
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1201_0300_10:
You see, I’ve been training with Samurott here to
deepen our bond.
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1201_0400_10: But...I can’t seem to keep up with his energy.
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1201_0500_10:
It’s not easy for people and Pokémon to truly be in
sync with one another, huh?
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_0401_0800_10:
There are some other Pokémon that have been
with me since I came to Hisui...
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_0402_1000_10:
Pikachu’s been my dependable companion ever
since we were in Hisui.
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_0402_1100_10:
There are some other Pokémon that came here
with me...
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1201_1200_10:
But Samurott is the only one that’s become my
sync partner on Pasio so far.
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1201_1300_10:
My other Pokémon seem wary of the environment
on this island and these strange Poké Balls.
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1201_1400_10: But I met Samurott right after we got to Pasio...
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1201_1500_10:
Maybe that’s why he didn’t seem to hesitate with
these future Poké Balls?
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1201_1600_10:
Anyway, that’s why Samurott is my only sync
partner for now.
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1201_1700_10:
But there’s actually a bigger reason why I want to
deepen my bond with him.
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1201_1800_10:
And that reason is Rei, my Survey
Corps teammate!
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1201_1900_10:
He’s been growing fast as a member of the
Survey Corps. He’s getting better and better at
Pokémon battles...
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1201_2000_10:
In order to catch up to him, I felt a strong need to
face my Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1201_2100_10:
and connect with them in the same way that
everyone on Pasio does with theirs.
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1201_2200_10: I want to reach your and Rei’s level!
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1201_2300_10:
Samurott taught me how harsh wild Pokémon
can be...
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1201_2400_10:
and the potential for people and Pokémon to live
side by side.
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1201_2500_10:
I want to build my relationship with Samurott from
scratch without fearing his power—and for us to
be able to understand one another.
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1201_2600_10:
The moment we can trust each other from the
bottom of our hearts is when we’ll become true—
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_0402_3000_10: You really get what I’m trying to say!
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1201_3100_10:
I’ve been asking myself what Pokémon mean
to me.
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1201_3200_10:
I’m determined to really work with Samurott to
find the answer!
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1201_3300_10:
When we become a sync pair that’s just as
brilliant as you and Rei are with your
partner Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0291_00_sho/2301_1201_3400_10: I’ll grow even closer to Samurott and Pikachu!
